cat_cow.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
cat_cow.instruction: Move spine rhythmically. Breathe deeply. 8-10 reps.

dyn_ham_scoop.name: Dynamic Hamstring Scoop
dyn_ham_scoop.instruction: Step forward, heel down, scoop ground. Alternate legs, 6 per side.

hip_opener.name: Dynamic Hip Opener
hip_opener.instruction: Deep lunge, rotate torso toward front knee. Alternate sides, 5 per side.

cossack_sq.name: Cossack Squat
cossack_sq.instruction: Wide stance, sit into one heel. Alternate sides, 6 per side.

world_greatest.name: World's Greatest Stretch
world_greatest.instruction: Lunge + rotate torso + reach overhead. Alternate sides, 5 per side (hold 3s each).

leg_swings.name: Leg Swings
leg_swings.instruction: Stand on one leg, swing other forward/back. 10 swings per leg, then switch.

hip_circles.name: Active Hip Circles
hip_circles.instruction: Lift knee, circle outward then inward. 5 circles each direction per leg.

ankle_circles.name: Ankle Circles
ankle_circles.instruction: Point and circle ankle. 10 circles each direction per foot.

inchworm.name: Inchworm
inchworm.instruction: Walk hands out to plank, walk feet to hands, stand. 6 reps.

a_skips.name: A-Skips
a_skips.instruction: Skip forward with high knee drive, alternate legs. 20 total skips.

lateral_lunge_dyn.name: Dynamic Lateral Lunge
lateral_lunge_dyn.instruction: Wide step to side, shift weight, push back. Alternate sides, 6 per side.

arm_circles.name: Arm Circles
arm_circles.instruction: Large circles forward then backward. 10 each direction.

thoracic_rotation.name: Thoracic Rotation
thoracic_rotation.instruction: Quadruped position, hand behind head, rotate open. 6 per side.

wall_ankle_mob.name: Wall Ankle Mobilization
wall_ankle_mob.instruction: Front foot near wall, drive knee past toes. 8 pulses per ankle.

glute_bridge_dyn.name: Dynamic Glute Bridge
glute_bridge_dyn.instruction: Hip thrust with 2s hold at top, squeeze glutes. 10 reps.

squat_hip_rotation.name: Squat Hip Rotation
squat_hip_rotation.instruction: In squat, rotate knees inward/outward. 8 rotations.
